title: Carrillo Carousel!
itunes:title: Carrillo Carousel!
description: The Godfather of Boutique Cigars, Ernesto Perrez Carrillo, and his son Ernesto Carrillo III, join Dave Garofalo Mr Jonathon and Chuck Morrison on today's Cigar Authority where the boys light up the E.P. Carrillo Inaugural 2009 from Epic Cigars, as well as the E.P. Carrillo Edicion Limitada 2010. It's a Carrillo carousel only The Cigar Authority!
